data.name: Alternate Universe
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the Alternate Universe. A First-Person action, strategy, and a simulation game. In the Alternate Universe, there's game mode like Campaign of Horror, Scuffed Multiplayer, and Outbreak.

Key Features


Single Player Campaign of Horror: Explore your trauma from your middle, and high school days as you fight your own problems from consuming you. Your choices depends on how your story ends.

Scuffed Multiplayer: The extended version of Scuffy Game... I think. Yeah we're sorry.

Features for this mode:

  • Up to 30 players
  • [TBD] Maps
  • [TBD] Game Modes

Outbreak: The story continues from the events of Scuffy Game and The Horror Story. The Multigroup has send their creatures to stop us from saving the multiverse. As Scuffy Game's universe was rebooting, the Multigroup has corrupted 90% of the multiverse. Our home is next, and it's time to fight for our universe. The choices you make depends on you.

data.short_description: Welcome to the Alternate Universe. A First-Person action, strategy, and a simulation game. In the Alternate Universe, there's game mode like Campaign of Horror, Scuffed Multiplayer, and Outbreak.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: intel® Core™ i7-8700 CPU @ 3.70GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 3200G or higher
  • Memory: 12 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 @ 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 470 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 or later
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Core I5 or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1024 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final

data.legal_notice: © 2022 Phoenix Limit LLC. All rights reserved.

content_descriptors.notes: The Campaign game mode contains depictions of depression, anxiety, and suicide, and may not be suitable for all audiences. The rest of the game contains bright flashing imagery that may cause discomfort and/or seizures for those with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised.
